Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: First, the user wants 20 thought-provoking, open-ended questions based on the supply chain process described. These should focus on discovering more insights, potential issues, strategies for improvement, and implications of various decisions.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: ## Generating question ideas  - The user needs 20 thought-provoking, open-ended questions related to the supply chain process.  - Focus is on uncovering insights, identifying potential issues, and exploring improvement strategies.  - Questions should also consider the implications of various supply chain decisions.  - Aim for questions that encourage deep analysis and creative problem-solving.
